subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Robbie Gould's 49-yard field goal in overtime lifted the Bears to a victory over the Seahawks that moved Chicago into the N.F.C. championship game against the Saints next Sunday.
snippet: Robbie Gould's 49-yard field goal in overtime lifted the Bears to a victory over the Seahawks that moved Chicago into the N.F.C. championship game against the Saints next Sunday.
